manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AILESSOM Native 1080P 5G WiFi Bluetooth 4K supported Projector,designed for your happy life! Best 4K Support Video Projector with Wifi & Bluetooth for Home & Outdoor Entertainment AILESSOM Native 1080P WiFi Projector with Bluetooth, It is worthwhile for you to have one to enjoy your Home entertainment and as gift to your friends, kids, lovers and families members anytime. AILESSOM 5G WiFi Bluetooth portable projector uses a newly upgraded low-consumption LED light source, high-quality materials, and exquisite manufacturing technology. It supports 4K, native 1920*1080P resolution, 450ANSI 15000 lumens brightness, and 12000:1 contrast ratio. The 450" large screen provides stunning projection images. Not only the 4K video projector protects your eyes, but the picture quality is also clearer and more delicate. It provides you with a movie-watching experience like an "IMAX theater". AILESSOM is a leading manufacturer of movie projectors that stays on the cutting edge of design, production, sales, and service. We are committed to making the best video projector experience accessible to everyone.We’re here to help!

Home Video Projector,Enjoy Your Family Time Native 1080P Resolution Native 1080P Projector with a true 1920 x 1080 Resolution, It delivers bright large-screen with fantastic image clarity, outstanding color accuracy and incredibly sharp image detail to both homes and businesses. Reinforced 12000:1 Color Contrast Ratio Contrast ratio refers to the measurement of different levels of brightness between the brightest whites and the darkest blacks in the light and dark areas of an image, The larger the difference, the higher the contrast. With AILESSOM 12000:1 contrast ratio, you can appreciate more layered and more gorgeous pictures. Besides, the high contrast has a greater impact on the clarity, detail performance, and gray level of the projected images.AILESSOM projector with the higher contrast is your perfect choice. 15000LM High Brightness The higher brightness of the projector, the brighter and clearer the pictures will be. AILESSOM L300 utilizes bright LED light and LCD display technology, the brightness is up to 15000LM. It offers you delicate and clear pictures and an excellent movie viewing experience. it can offer you bright, clear image even during daytime Support Ceiling/Tripod/Table/ Front and Rear The powerful projector supports ceiling and rear projection. For important holiday's (Halloween, Christmas, New Year) decorations, this projector can back project beautiful pictures onto your Windows or screen via rear function. You'll be pleasantly surprised by this meaningful design! Equipped with timer mode function With an 8-step timer mode function of 10min → 20min → 30min → 60min → 90min → 120min → 180min → 240min, you can fall asleep while watching your favorite content.

Watch Outdoor Movies With Your friends and Lovers Max 450” & Digital Zoom & Keystone Correction Our projector’s projection screen ranges in size from 51 inches to 450 inches. You can change the screen size from 100% to 75% by using the remote control or adjusting the distance between the projector and screen. Freely adjust the screen size and projection distance.With a manual focus lens and ±15° keystone correction, you can easily get square and clear images. Bluetooth 5.1 Equipped with the fifth-generation Bluetooth technology, our projector can achieve twice the data transfer speed as well as less energy-consuming. You can enjoy an immersive listening experience via a quick connection with your Bluetooth devices, like external Bluetooth speakers, headphones, earbuds, etc. Advanced Built-in HIFI Speaker Equipped with dual powerful Stereo Surround speakers with SRS sound system, providing you with excellent and loud sound quality in different scenes. With such a wonderful auditory carnival, you'll enjoy the pleasure of listening! Efficient Heat Dissipation System & Incredible Low Noise This projector uses advanced double-sided cooling technology. The air circulation inside the device is more hierarchical so that each heat source inside it can achieve good ventilation and heat dissipation effect. It can not only reduce noise but also effectively extend the working life of the projector.

Big Screen for Wonderful Decorations With 51''-450'' large screen and 100%-75% Zoom function. The 1080P WiFi projector is perfect for video whatching and photo displaying. You can show anything you want at the birthday party, anniversary celebration or other decorations. Focus and Keystone Adjustment Our movie projector allows ±15° vertical&horizontal adjustment, you could get ideal square images even if the movie projector is off-axis or tilt up/down. Then adjust focus to get a clear picture. Built-in Dual HiFi Stereo Speakers The 1080P Projector Built-in 2 stereo surround speakers to meet your sound quality requirements while watching movies. With the newest Bluetooth 5.1 chips inside, you can connect with extra sperkers as well.

Equipped with timer mode function With an 8-step timer mode function of 10min → 20min → 30min → 60min → 90min → 120min → 180min → 240min, you can fall asleep while watching your favorite content. Advanced Cooling Tech & Lower Noise With the advanced double-sided cooling technology and fan noise suppression system, the heat of the bulb can be effectively cooled and the noise is greatly reduced.Reduce the occurrence of black spots, and bring you a clearer visual experience. Dust-proof Design AILESSOM TV Projectors adopt sealed optical technology to protect optical components. Avoid projector issues such as spotty projection and color degradation.Reduce expenditures on maintenance and also reduce the time and trouble required to fix equipment.

2.4G/5.0G Dual-band WiFi Supporting Airplay and Screen Mirroring for iOS/Android Devices AILESSOM dual-band 2.4G / 5G WiFi projector allows you to match your home's actual WiFi band freely. 2.4G network helps you get a more stable, wider coverage, and better penetration WiFi experience. With the ultrafast 5G WiFi connecting speed, watching movies, sports games, and everything you wanna watch via this projector within a few seconds become possible. Easy projection, quick synchronization. Wireless Screen Mirroring and Airplay function offer you multi-choice of watching all your favorite content. It supports both Android and iOS devices. No need to purchase an extra cable, facilitating every one of you. Warm Tips: 1. Due to HDCP copyright issues, Netflix / Disney Video prohibits playing movies directly from all projectors on the market. You can use a TV Stick/Roku/ Chrome cast to connect the projector to watch movies from Netflix, Hulu, and other similar services. 2. Please make sure that both the projector and your phone are connected to the same WiFi of your home. 3. Please keep your projector on the "Screen Mirroring for iOS/Android System" page before using your smartphone to project the screen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality is quite good. Screen on the wall is pretty nice for me and my girlfriend. We enjoy movies and TV shows in the evening.The projector is not big and easy to carry on if go outside. Camera supports dynamic angle with screws. I am also surprised with the sound quality but I still connect it to another audio device because it is a little noisy when running.The price is good currently with nice performance. And the projector supports multiple ways to connect: HDMI, AirPlay, etc which are pretty convenient for me (Instruction is good~~~). It works well with my PC, iPad and iPhone. No problem found till now.Overall 4.7/5~ The first time trying a projector, nice experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This projector is great, and I would like to go into some detail.First, the resolution is fully clear with 1080p, some other projectors that claim this are not quite up to par. It makes such a clear picture indoor and outdoors.Next, the connection is easy, fast, and fast bandwidth, and can use 5G, which results in not stuttering like in other ones.Lastly, the color gamut and the contrast is amazing. Ive owned projectors before that you cant really tel the difference between pitch black and gray, in glad this one is so vibrant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for movie nights!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is the second projector I bought because I love movie nights! This one was far better than the previous one I had, the previous was way too dark and not clear at all, it was similar in price too! Mind you have this on a brown wall and it’s STILL clear. I use it with my treadmill usually and watch while I walk and it’s perfect. You can move it further back if u want it bigger. You screw it on to the tripod and it’s that simple. I bought a white screen thinking I need a white bg but you don’t so save ur money (unless you’re doing it outside or sth) the only thing I would say is when u turn it off, the control buttons stay blue so I usually unplug it just in case. For the price and the quality, I really do recommend it. Plus my cat loves it ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this projector for outside movie night. It has great clear vision however wish it had Bluetooth capabilities overall good projector for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy - welcome to the Swim-In Theater!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up, decent picture (a little washed out BUT we have ambient lighting and broadcasting from 20+ feet from screen). Bluetooth works great. We have AppleTV hooked to HDMI and it’s perfection. Cannot wait till football season!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worst purchase - returning
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my daughter's bday movie night. It was a night mare setting this up. We spend 5 -6 hours figuring this out. We were trying to connect the projector on bluetooth to an i phone. Were not able to connect to speakers at all. In built sound system is pathetic for outdoor you can not hear it. We had all the set up done for movie night in our back yard everything was great just no movie. IT WAS SUCH A DISAPPOINTMENT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, excellent price!
reviews.reviewText: Everything I expected, far as visual and sound quality. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Clear video. And the sound is very good for it being a projector. You can change the size of the screen and it comes with sheet and attachments to hang them.
